turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please order a Starbucks caffe mocha with coconut milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like any whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a grande caffe mocha with coconut milk and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, one moment while i place your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a grande caffe mocha with coconut milk and whipped cream, to be picked up at the starbucks in westlake, daly city, ca, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, at 1588 North Milwaukee Avenue, Chicago, Illinois.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me send your order to the starbucks on milwaukee avenue, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have transferred your order to the starbucks on milwaukee avenue, it will be ready for pickup in 6 minutes, your receipt will be texted to you, can i help with anything else?
